name: Adventure 3D
description:
A remake of Adventure, originally created by Warren Robbinett

The player's goal is to find the enchanted chalice! The player character explores a multi-screen landscape containing castles, mazes, and various rooms. Hidden throughout the world are a sword and a magic lantern.


CONTROLS

This is a Restricted FP Exploration Game! You can ONLY look forward (Turning Not Possible!)

Arrow Keys to Move and Space Bar to Grab and Hold Space to Sustain Grip.
